DOC.brief_title: Natural History Study Patients With Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine impact current procedure diagnosis , management , follow-up disease status patient newly diagnose chronic myelogenous leukemia ( CML ) . - Determine natural history patient CML achieve response imatinib mesylate . - Determine health perception , symptom , insurance issue , work issue patient . - Determine whether medication compliance plan dose reduction affect imatinib mesylate effectiveness patient . - Determine molecular biologic factor associate disease progression good poor response imatinib mesylate patient . OUTLINE : This longitudinal , prospective , cohort study . Patients complete quality life , functional status , medical treatment history , medication questionnaire baseline every 6 month 5 year . Blood sample collect baseline every 6 month 5 year . Specimens may examine future gene array study mutation analysis .
